name: minions-test-observability-workspace
description: Trace capture, tool call logs, reasoning timings, and latency breakdowns
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/cli run build && pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/docs run build && pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/blog run build && pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-test-observability/cli run lint
